gmOnly.name: GM Only
gmOnly.hint: If your players are abusing the confetti, enable this and prevent them shooting it.

fireRateLimit.name: Fire Rate Limit (Seconds)
fireRateLimit.hint: Starts a cooldown after each shot. Highly recommended! (0 is no-limit)

confettiMultiplier.name: Confetti Multiplier
confettiMultiplier.hint: Multiplies the amount of confetti pieces fired. Set this high at your own peril!

showButtons.name: Show Buttons
showButtons.hint: (Requires reload) Disable if you are only interested in using it from macros/modules and/or the buttons conflict with other module(s).

muteSounds.name: Mute Sounds
muteSounds.hint: Mutes the confetti firing sounds. Silence is golden?

showOthersConfettiScale.name: Show Other Players Confetti Scale
showOthersConfettiScale.hint: Tick if you want to see the confetti from other players scaled by their settings.

showOthersGlitterDeviation.name: Show Other Players Glitter Deviation
showOthersGlitterDeviation.hint: Tick if you want to see the glitter confetti from other players colour cycled by their settings.

confettiStyleChoice.name: Confetti Style Choice
confettiStyleChoice.hint: Default: Multi colored confetti. | Base Color: Confetti with the chosen base color below. | Glitter: Sparkly color cycling confetti. | Base Glitter: Glitter derived from the base color.

confettiColorBase.name: Confetti Color Base
confettiColorBase.hint: Confetti will be colored with this as the base color if enabled below.

confettiGlitterDeviation.name: Glitter Color Deviation
confettiGlitterDeviation.hint: How much deviation from the starting color you want when the glitter pieces are color cycled.

confettiScale.name: Confetti Scale
confettiScale.hint: How big you want your confetti pieces to be.
